pages.title: Lirothian Forest
pages.text: The Lirothian Forest is a forest covered in these odd

trees. The area seems oddly entrancing, as if I am on hallucinagetics while also feeling completely conscious. The trees here are also pulsing with some odd sap, however it seems the moment I harvest these logs, the sap dries almost instantaneously. The sun and moon I am used to are not the ones that inhabit the sky, meaning I didn't just hop a realm, but I escaped what was my own planet with it.

The grass/dirt here is very mushy, stepping upon it makes me grimace, as it makes me sink ever so slightly. I can't even begin to describe the smell, constantly smelling as if something here rotted over and over again, it really stings my nose and my eyes to say the least.
